long: Meaning: "Nebukadnetstsar" (or -"retstsar", or -"retstsor"), king of Babylon.  Usage: Nebuchadnezzar, Nebuchadrezzar.  Source: or "נְבֻּכַדְנֶאצַּר"; (2 Kings 24:1,10), or "נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּר"; (Esther 2:6; Daniel 1:18), or "נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּר"; or "נְבוּכַדְרֶאצּוֹר"; (Ezra 2:1; Jeremiah 49:28), of foreign derivation;
